review: My twins love this, awesome kid programming. Thank you!

review: Easy to use as advertised. Access to Amazon prime programming already yielding benefits
author: DALE L DIDONATO

review: The "Stick" was good. Connect was trouble free, instructions stepped through each phase of connection with out trouble. Could not give a higher rating because nothing talked about price for each element installed.
author: Amazon Customer "Woody the surfer"

review: Set up was simple.  Started using it right away. So far, works beautifully .
author: Henry Williams "Jaloux"

review: I'm giving up cable. I get so much more from Amazon Fire TV it's so unbelievable. I wish I could get local new broadcast but other than that I'm getting my entertainment fill. From Music to movies.
author: Joe Huffman

review: Was exactly as described and arrived within a week. Very happy with this!
author: Shannon S
